PerfectNetExp.abs: dishearteningly 使人沮丧地disheartenment 气馁dished 中凹的

list.abs: I get really disheartened because I still cannot speak English well ., 我真灰心因为我还是说不好英语.
The disheartened instructor tried vainly to arouse their interest ., 沮丧的教师试图激起他们的兴趣 , 但却是徒劳.
those young men are too easily disheartened by difficulties ., 那些年青人遇到困难时太容易泄气了.
He was not disheartened , and he continued with his researches ., 他没有失去信心 , 仍然继续自己的研究.

means.word_mean: 1. the feeling of despair in the face of obstacles
2. a communication that leaves you disheartened or daunted

auth_sentence.content: The country has filled me with great inspiration and deep disheartenment for many years.
auth_sentence.res_content: The country has filled me with great inspiration and deep disheartenment for many years.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The country has filled me with great inspiration and deep disheartenment for many years.
